site.description:
Virtual (a.k.a. "soft") word wrap feature. Wordwrap plugin will break long lines without modifying underying file physically. New menu item "Virtual Word Wrap" is added to editor context menu.
WARNING! Behaviour of this feature is experimental! Currently it is wrapping properly BUT will make line numbering, active line highlight etc rendering damaged. All damaged line numbers, line highlights etc will be OK after disabling wrap for active editor! The final version will (hopefully) work without any troubles.
